title: Who's the Cutie?
body: I saw this cute seal like thing in the new pool party splash.... is this Pool Party LuLu's Pix? or is this just some random cute thing!? cuz its absolutely adorable!

replies.body: It's the critter Lulu turns enemy champions into temporarily with her W. Pix is the blowfish.
So who is the champion that got turned into that little guy?
Cho'gath. Do you not see that menacing maw, salivating with the prospect of eating you whole?
Q_Q but imho the seal looks female (atleast how most anime female's faces are drawn) so... maybe rek'sai?
well looks like i gotta be agenst a LuLu every game then Q_Q
you bet your head you will. buying her the second she comes out <3
